game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, humanity is on the brink of extinction.
game.ending: The player's actions have either restored magic to the world or brought about its permanent destruction, depending on their choices throughout the game.
game.synopsis: In the world of Eridoria, magic has vanished and the people are struggling to survive. You play as a young apprentice tasked with uncovering the cause of this sudden loss. As you journey across the land, you must navigate treacherous landscapes, battle fearsome enemies, and make difficult choices that will determine the fate of Eridoria. Will you be able to restore magic to its former glory, or will your actions seal the world's doom?
game.title: Eridoria: Last Hope
